Function Documentation

void DACD16_DataSourceConfig ( HT_DAC_DUAL16_TypeDef *  DACx,
DAC_Dual16_Ch  DAC_CH_x,
DAC_Dual16_Source  DATA_FROM_x 
)

Configure the data source for the DAC channel.

Parameters:
DACx,:where DACx is the selected DAC from the DAC peripherals.
DAC_CH_x,:the DAC channel to configure This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • DAC_CH_R : DAC Right Channel selected
  • DAC_CH_L : DAC Left Channel selected
DATA_FROM_x,:Configure the data source. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • DATA_FROM_UC : data and control signal from uC
  • DATA_FROM_MIDI : data and control signal from MIDI
Return values:
None

void DACD16_SetChannelData ( HT_DAC_DUAL16_TypeDef *  DACx,
DAC_Dual16_Ch  DAC_CH_x,
u16  Data 
)

Configure the data source for the DAC channel.

Parameters:
DACx,:where DACx is the selected DAC from the DAC peripherals.
DAC_CH_x,:the DAC channel to configure This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • DAC_CH_R : DAC Right Channel selected
  • DAC_CH_L : DAC Left Channel selected
Data: Data to be loaded in the selected channel data register.
Return values:
None
